data.comment: Today's referee, Santiago Jaime Latre, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 2, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a throw-in for Real Betis, close to Valladolid's area.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Real Betis.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
An attacking Real Betis player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Nabil Fekir smashes in a penalty at Benito Villamarin. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Real Betis in the half of Valladolid.
In the minute 14, The match at Benito Villamarin has been interrupted briefly for a check on Javi Moyano, who is down injured.
Luis Perez (Valladolid) has replaced the possibly injured Javi Moyano.
Real Betis have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 16, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Real Betis to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
In the minute 18, Goal! William Carvalho extends Real Betis's lead to 2-0.
Free kick Valladolid.
Throw-in for Real Betis in their own half.
In the minute 21, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
Borja Iglesias (Real Betis) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Real Betis throw-in in Valladolid's half.
In the minute 24, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Betis's half?
In the minute 26, Can Real Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Real Betis's William Carvalho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Valladolid at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Real Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valladolid to take a throw-in in Real Betis territory.
Nabil Fekir (Real Betis) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 31, Can Valladolid capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Real Betis.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Real Betis's Nabil Fekir gets in a shot on goal at Benito Villamarin. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Real Betis in their own half.
Throw-in for Valladolid at Benito Villamarin.
Real Betis's Nabil Fekir misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, Santiago Jaime Latre awards Valladolid a goal kick.
Valladolid drive forward but Fabian Orellana is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In the minute 45, 5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Real Betis.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
Santiago Jaime Latre blows against Real Betis's Alex Moreno for offside.
Free kick for Valladolid in the half of Real Betis.
In the minute 45, In Seville, Valladolid push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The first-half is over at Benito Villamarin.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Valladolid throw-in in Real Betis's half.
Throw-in for Real Betis in their own half.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Michel Herrero with Pablo Hervias.
Valladolid make their second substitution with Shon Weissman replacing Waldo Rubio.
Kike Perez is on a sub for Oscar Plano for Valladolid.
Free kick Valladolid.
In the minute 48, Valladolid are whistled for offside.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
In the minute 50, Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 55, Real Betis's Emerson breaks free at Benito Villamarin. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Valladolid at Benito Villamarin.
Throw-in for Valladolid at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 56, Kike Perez of Valladolid gets in a strike, but is off target.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Real Betis a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Real Betis.
In the minute 58, Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Benito Villamarin, Emerson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Guido Rodriguez (Real Betis) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 59, Real Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cristian Tello is replacing Nabil Fekir for Real Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Free kick for Real Betis in the half of Valladolid.
In the minute 61, Joaquin Fernandez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Joaquin Fernandez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Javi Sanchez is the substitute for Valladolid.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valladolid.
Throw-in Real Betis.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Valladolid throw-in in Real Betis's half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Real Betis.
Valladolid's Fabian Orellana is on target but unsuccessful.
Borja Iglesias for Real Betis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Throw-in for Real Betis at Benito Villamarin.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 67, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Valladolid in their own half.
Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Betis's half?
In the minute 69, The home team have replaced Borja Iglesias with Antonio Sanabria. This is the second substitution made today by Manuel Pellegrini.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Juanmi is replacing Joaquin for the home team.
In the minute 72, Valladolid drives forward and Kike Perez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Real Betis.
William Carvalho (Real Betis) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 75, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Real Betis.
Free kick for Real Betis in the half of Valladolid.
Real Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Real Betis in their own half.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Valladolid in their own half.
Free kick Valladolid.
In the minute 85, Real Betis are coming forward and Antonio Sanabria gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Real Betis have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In Seville Real Betis attack through Antonio Sanabria. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Valladolid have a goal kick.
Real Betis's Cristian Tello breaks free at Benito Villamarin. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
In the minute 89, Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
Luis Perez of Valladolid is pulled up for offside.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Real Betis have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Real Betis make their fourth substitution with Paul Akouokou replacing William Carvalho.
